tool_description: The WebKnox Words API lets you have your way with words. Get the singular, plural, present, past, past participle, or synonyms of a word.
name: Words
title: Words

api_list.name: Transform to Plural
api_list.description: Transform a noun in its plural form.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com/words/mouse/plural"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com/words/{word}/plural"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Stem a Word
api_list.description: Retrieve the stem of an English word.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com/words/bicycle/stem"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com/words/{word}/stem"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Transform to Simple Past
api_list.description: Transform a verb into the simple past tense.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word to be transformed into simple past.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com/words/go/simplePast"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Synonyms
api_list.description: Get a list of synonyms for a word.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word for which you want to retrieve synonyms.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com/words/bike/synonyms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Transform to the Third Person Singular
